title: Deployer is a public authority or a Union institution/body/office/agency

nodes.label: Deployer is a public authority or Union institution/body/office/agency (or acting on its behalf)

question.prompt: Is the deployer a public authority or a Union institution, body, office or agency, or acting on behalf of one?
question.help: Answer yes if the deployer is part of the public sector or a Union institution/body/office/agency, including when acting on its behalf.
